DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Were difference functional ability ambulatory individual SCI pass failed independent sit-to-stand ( iSTS ) task ? 2 . Did ability iSTS relate ability walking determine use type AAD use ? 3 . What factor associate ability iSTS ?
DOC.detailed_description: - To evaluate proportion compare functional ability subject pass failed independent sit-to-stand ( iSTS ) task . - To assess relationship ability iSTS type AAD use . - To investigate factor associate ability iSTS .
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory patient iSCI nontraumatic traumatic cause Aged least 18 year Who able walk independently without AADs least 15 meter continuously [ FIM locomotor ( FIML ) score = 5 7 ] Any patient condition might affect ambulatory ability ; brain function disorder , visual deficit , musculoskeletal pain ( VAS > 5 ) , deformity musculoskeletal system , unable follow command test , unstable medical condition .
